Dear Lucy,

This is a collection of memories. So many things happen that we might just forget later, so for the ones I want us to remember, I write down. You can check this occasionally, because I'll continue to keep adding to this for as long as I can.

From the beginning

Happy 1 year!

September 7, 2019
